verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician<s%> upon <S%H7799>Shoshannim,<s%> A Psalm of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H3467>Save<s%> me, O <S%H430>God;<s%> for the <S%H4325>waters<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> in to my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

I <S%H2883>sink<s%> in <S%H4688>deep<s%> <S%H3121>mire,<s%> where there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4613>standing:<s%> I am <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H4615>deep<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> where the <S%H7641>floods<s%> <S%H7857>overflow<s%> me.
I am <S%H3021>weary<s%> of my <S%H7121>crying:<s%> my <S%H1627>throat<s%> is <S%H2787>dried:<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H3615>fail<s%> while I <S%H3176>wait<s%> for my <S%H430>God.<s%>

They that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me <S%H2600>without<s%> a <S%H2600>cause<s%> are <S%H7231>more<s%> than the <S%H8185>hairs<s%> of my <S%H7218>head:<s%> they that would <S%H6789>destroy<s%> me, being my <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H8267>wrongfully,<s%> are <S%H6105>mighty:<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> I <S%H7725>restored<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H1497>took<s%> not <S%H1497>away.<s%>
O <S%H430>God,<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H200>foolishness;<s%> and my <S%H819>sins<s%> are not <S%H3582>hid<s%> from you.

Let not them that <S%H6960>wait<s%> on you, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> for my sake: let not those that <S%H1245>seek<s%> you be <S%H3637>confounded<s%> for my sake, O <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
<S%H3588>Because<s%> for your <S%H5921>sake<s%> I have <S%H5375>borne<s%> <S%H2781>reproach;<s%> <S%H3639>shame<s%> has <S%H3680>covered<s%> my <S%H6440>face.<s%>
I am <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H2114>stranger<s%> to my <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and an <S%H5237>alien<s%> to my <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1121>children.<s%>
For the <S%H7068>zeal<s%> of your <S%H1004>house<s%> has <S%H398>eaten<s%> me up; and the <S%H2781>reproaches<s%> of them that <S%H2778>reproached<s%> you are <S%H5307>fallen<s%> on me.
When I <S%H1058>wept,<s%> and chastened my <S%H5315>soul<s%> with <S%H6685>fasting,<s%> that was to my <S%H2781>reproach.<s%>
I <S%H5414>made<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> also my <S%H3830>garment;<s%> and I <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H4912>proverb<s%> to them.
They that <S%H3427>sit<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H7878>speak<s%> against me; and I was the <S%H5058>song<s%> of the <S%H8354>drunkards.<s%> <S%H7941><s%>

But as for me, my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> is to you, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in an <S%H7522>acceptable<s%> <S%H6256>time:<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H2617>mercy<s%> <S%H6030>hear<s%> me, in the <S%H571>truth<s%> of your <S%H3468>salvation.<s%>

<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me out of the <S%H2916>mire,<s%> and let me not <S%H2883>sink:<s%> let me be <S%H5337>delivered<s%> from them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me, and out of the <S%H4615>deep<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

Let not the <S%H7641>flood<s%> <S%H4325><s%> <S%H7857>overflow<s%> me, <S%H408>neither<s%> let the <S%H4688>deep<s%> <S%H1104>swallow<s%> me up, and let not the <S%H875>pit<s%> <S%H332>shut<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth<s%> on me.

<S%H6030>Hear<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> for your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> is <S%H2896>good:<s%> <S%H6437>turn<s%> to me according to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your tender <S%H7356>mercies.<s%>
And <S%H5641>hide<s%> not your <S%H6440>face<s%> from your <S%H5650>servant;<s%> for I am in <S%H6887>trouble:<s%> <S%H6030>hear<s%> me <S%H4118>speedily.<s%>
Draw <S%H7126>near<s%> to my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and <S%H1350>redeem<s%> it: <S%H6299>deliver<s%> me <S%H4616>because<s%> of my <S%H341>enemies.<s%>
You have <S%H3045>known<s%> my <S%H2781>reproach,<s%> and my <S%H1322>shame,<s%> and my <S%H3639>dishonor:<s%> my <S%H6887>adversaries<s%> are <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> you.

<S%H2781>Reproach<s%> has <S%H7665>broken<s%> my <S%H3820>heart;<s%> and I am full of <S%H5136>heaviness:<s%> and I <S%H6960>looked<s%> for some to take <S%H5110>pity,<s%> but there was <S%H369>none;<s%> and for <S%H5162>comforters,<s%> but I <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>none.<s%>
They <S%H5414>gave<s%> me also <S%H7219>gall<s%> for my <S%H1267>meat;<s%> and in my <S%H6772>thirst<s%> they gave me <S%H2558>vinegar<s%> to <S%H8248>drink.<s%>
Let their <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H6341>snare<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them: and that which should have been for their <S%H7965>welfare,<s%> let it become a <S%H4170>trap.<s%>
Let their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> be <S%H2821>darkened,<s%> that they <S%H7200>see<s%> not; and make their <S%H4975>loins<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> to <S%H4571>shake.<s%>
<S%H8210>Pour<s%> out your <S%H2195>indignation<s%> on them, and let your <S%H2740>wrathful<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H5381>take<s%> <S%H5381>hold<s%> of them.
Let their <S%H2918>habitation<s%> be <S%H8074>desolate;<s%> and let <S%H408>none<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in their <S%H168>tents.<s%>
For they <S%H7291>persecute<s%> him <S%H834>whom<s%> you have <S%H5221>smitten;<s%> and they <S%H5608>talk<s%> to the <S%H4341>grief<s%> of those whom you have <S%H2491>wounded.<s%>
<S%H5414>Add<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to their <S%H5771>iniquity:<s%> and let them not <S%H935>come<s%> into your <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>
Let them be <S%H4229>blotted<s%> out of the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H2416>living,<s%> and not be <S%H3789>written<s%> with the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>
But I am <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H3510>sorrowful:<s%> let your <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> set me up on <S%H7682>high.<s%>
I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> with a <S%H7892>song,<s%> and will <S%H1431>magnify<s%> him with <S%H8426>thanksgiving.<s%>
This also shall <S%H3190>please<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3190>better<s%> than an <S%H7794>ox<s%> or <S%H6499>bullock<s%> that has <S%H7160>horns<s%> and <S%H6536>hoofs.<s%>
The <S%H6041>humble<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> this, and be <S%H8056>glad:<s%> and your <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%> that <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>
For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>hears<s%> the <S%H34>poor,<s%> and <S%H959>despises<s%> not his <S%H615>prisoners.<s%>
Let the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> him, the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> thing that <S%H7430>moves<s%> therein.

For <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and will <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> that they may <S%H3427>dwell<s%> there, and have it in <S%H3423>possession.<s%>
The <S%H2233>seed<s%> also of his <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> it: and they that <S%H157>love<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> therein.
